confirm_model.title: Confirm your model
confirm_model.description: Please check that your device is a OnePlus Nord N10 5G (billie).

bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press and hold the volume down and power buttons until the screen turns on. It should say 'Fastboot Mode' underneath the warning sign.

bootloader_from_fastbootd.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader_from_fastbootd.description: With the device still at the fastbootd screen, use the volume buttons to select "Reboot to bootloader".

recovery.title: Reboot to Recovery
recovery.description: With the device still at the 'Fastboot Mode' screen (if not, power off the device and press and hold volume down and power buttons until the screen turns on), select the 'Recovery Mode' option by using the volume buttons and press the power button to enter.

fastbootd.title: Reboot to fastbootd mode
fastbootd.description: With the device still at the "FastBoot Mode", use the Volume buttons to switch to "Recovery Mode" and push the power button to confirm your selection. Then select "Fastboot mode" from the list.

downgrade_android.title: Downgrade Android
downgrade_android.description: If the device is running an Android version above 10.0, you have to downgrade to the last 10.0 release. Please make sure to flash version OxygenOS_10.5.10 of the factory image before proceeding.

support.title: Support
support.description: For details about Sagetea Software support for the XFone, please head over to the Sagetea Support here.

options.name: Wipe Userdata
options.tooltip: Wipe personal data. This is necessary for first time installations.

options.name: Partitioning
options.tooltip: Changes partition sizes as required. Only necessary for first time installations.
